thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideally situated
thread.title_full: Ideally situated - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: maddox66
title: Ideally situated
text:
Rooms very reasonably proportioned for a city hotel, with the exception of the bathroom that was very small !!
Breakfast was included, reasonable choice but go early otherwise it can be extremely chaotic.
All staff are extremely welcoming and very helpful with a good knowledge of local amenities.
Definitely stay here again.
